resources.string: DeskSMS forwards your SMS to your Google Talk and/or Gmail. And reply back to respond via text!
Login failed. Please verify your internet connection and try again. Logging in with a Google Apps email address may not work. If the error persists, please send a log to the developer.

DeskSMS will now ask you for permission to use your Google Account authentication for the purposes of push notifications and registration with our server. DeskSMS will not have access to your passwords or personal data.
Please log in with your Google Account to use DeskSMS.
Press OK to send a SMS to yourself. You should see the SMS arrive in your Messaging application as usual. You should also receive an email and optionally a Google Talk message as well!
This is a test message from DeskSMS!
Unable to retrieve your phone number. Please use your Messaging application to manually send yourself a text message to test DeskSMS.
The application %s was found installed. If you do not receive a text message, please verify that that it has not disabled SMS notifications in the application\'s settings.
There was an error communicating with the server. Please check your connection.
Disable SMS Notification to other applications. Do not use the notification disabler in GoSMS or Handcent; enable this instead.
Sync your SMS history to the DeskSMS server. This will enable you to use the DeskSMS web interface and view your message history online.
Do you want to remove this number from the blacklist?
Add DeskSMS email and IM addresses to your contact list. This will allow you to initate an SMS to someone via email or IM.
Please wait while your contact list is updated...
Sync your Call history to the DeskSMS server for online viewing.
You have successfully signed in!\n\nWarning: Push notifications were set up successfully, but the test push notification failed. There may be issues when sending messages via DeskSMS.
Unable to retrieve account status! Please try again later.
Thanks! Your purchase will be processed on the DeskSMS servers shortly.
Disables the stock Messaging app\'s notifications while DeskSMS is forwarding.
Adjust the date on incoming text messages. This workaround is necessary to fix date bugs on some Motorola phones.
The links to the DeskSMS Website, Chrome extensions, and usage tips has been sent to your email address.
DeskSMS was unable to log into your account. Please click to reauthenticate.
